title: Number of TV ads seen daily per person in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2008 to 2015
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Advertisements seen, containing a total of 8 data points.
Overall Advertisements seen has increased over the Year.
Advertisements seen is gradually increasing from 2008 to 2010, roughly constant from 2010 to 2013, slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2014, and lastly roughly constant from 2014 to 2015.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2009 and 2010.
The highest Advertisements seen, of value 47.0 was reached at Year 2011,  2012, and 2013
The lowest Advertisements seen, of value 42.0 was reported at Year 2008
